entry.title: First Class to Jamaica made it to The Today Show!

media:group.media:title: First Class to Jamaica made it to The Today Show!
media:group.media:description:
Thank you Jenna Bush Hager for featuring our First Class to Jamaica on The Today Show this morning! Jamaican Black Castor Oil promotes hair growth, moisturizes dry hair, eliminates dandruff and itchy scalp, strengthens thin hair, and prevents hair breakage. Jamaican Black Castor Oil can be used on a variety of hair types ‚Äî from thick and curly to thin and straight.
By applying this natural remedy to your hair, you help encourage the hair to grow longer, thicker, and faster for a gorgeous head of hair that stays strong and shiny! üíú DeeperThanHair.Com
